info: The subprogram 2 of the Second Local Government Finance and Governance Reform Program will support government efforts to improve living standards and local service delivery by implementing an efficient and equitable system of intergovernment fiscal relations. The reform priorities include efforts to improve the policy framework for fiscal decentralization, strengthen the capacity of regional government officials, and develop performance-oriented management systems.
name: 2ND LOCAL GOVT FINANCE & GOVERNANCE REFORM PROGRAM-SUBPROG 2
